A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most disappointing film ever. Such a shameful waste of characters\, actors and money! I laughed at the twists and the jokes just cuz they're ridiculous. This totally meaningless plot leads to nowhere. Poor Mark Hamill tried to warn us\, we didn't listen. We've all been betrayed by Disney and by this selfish and incompetent director. They brilliantly delivered an expensive and shiny piece of s**t.
